descriptions.content: brul gtor [Used for purification of the form of sin/pollution that comes about as the result of selling religious goods (dkor sgrib)]. See also Purification. Ex: Brul gtor dkor sgrib dag byed kyi khrid yig (W6587). See http://www.tbrc.org/kb/tbrc-detail-outline.xq;jsessionid=D8F1AA83BA68A894BC39BC02AFE2B854?address=3&wylie=n&RID=O00EGS109585#O00EGS1095859588
